app.mlt.ml.mnist.viewer

Class ImageCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Canvas
        • app.mlt.ml.mnist.viewer.ImageCanvas

  • public class ImageCanvas
extends Canvas
    A canvas to paint an image of rows/columns, from a double[] normalized input.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
